author: ashish
msg: Bug fix. The workeffort group WORKEFFORT_USER was not associated with WORKEFFORTMGR_VIEW so if you assign this group to any user then you can see or login into workeffort application. This is similar pattern that exists in accounting, partymgr & accounting component.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3399: Using Spring JMX annotations is picked up and use without the need for implementing ManagementAware, which has been @deprecated.
